p: Sera was recovered from blood collected from all calves on the day of inoculation, and 7, 11, 17, and 21 dpi, the day of challenge and 8, 11, 14, and 21 dpc. Detection of antibodies in sera to LSDV was achieved using the virus neutralization test (VNT) and the constant virus-varying serum method ( 29). For RVFV antibody detection, the standard VNT ( 30) was used and two ELISAsâ€“a RVFV immunoglobulin M (IgM) capture ELISA ( 31) and an immunoglobulin G (IgG) indirect ELISA ( 32).
